title: Book 9: An Interest in Interest
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 1,267 words, Level T (Grade 3), Lexile 580L, Fiction Series
description: Mike McCarthy has yet another new business idea but he needs a loan to get it started. Now, he has two loan offers on the table. Which one should he choose? An Interest in Interest is an engaging way to teach students about interest, loans, profits, and wage garnishments. Detailed illustrations and a realistic storyline will keep students interested in learning more about these important concepts. The book can also be used to teach students how to make inferences and draw conclusions as well as to retell to better understand the story.
